Ate here last night.  This was the BEST!  The freshest seafood you could imagine.  Pick out your pleasure and they take it back to the kitchen and cook it to your order.  No table service, who needs it?   For us, it was. Sip some Chardonnay and wait for them to call "Mesa quince" (Table 15).  We had a magnificent tuna steak, mussels, and giant prawns rounded out with a nice dry Spanish Chardonnay and a fresh salad.
